project_abstract.cdata: The principal objective of the Shandong Environment Project is to support China's efforts to put in place a sustainable environmental framework for the long-term economic and social development of the province, while supporting a conducive foundation for industrial growth. The project, part of a phased development program, comprises a blend of policy and investment initiatives, which support municipal strategies for environmental recovery and sustained use of natural water resources.  The five core components are: 1) investments in the Jihan Municipality for surface-water storage, pumping, transmission, and distribution facilities to improve water supply system reliability and protect groundwater; and investments in wastewater collection and pumping stations to protect Xiaoqing River water quality and fully use existing treatment facilities; 2) investments in district heating systems in Weihai Municipality, comprising combined heat and power generation plant and facilities, distribution systems, and support services for improved air quality; 3) investments in district heating systems in Yantai Municipality, comprising peak boiler and heat exchange plant and facilities, distribution systems, and support services for improved air quality; 4) environmental pollution and control; and 5) investments to support and strengthen provincial, municipal, project, and financial management, as well as construction of supervision services, training in sector and utility operations,  and updating of the Xiaoqing River Basin water quality and management database.

P040185.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>山东环保项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的主要目标是支持山东省制定并实施可持续环境框架，促进该省经济社会长期发展，同时支持为工业增长奠定坚实基础。本项目是一项分期实施发展规划的组成部分，其包括一系列政策和投资计划。这些计划旨在支持实施山东省市级政府制定的环境恢复和自然资源可持续利用战略。项目的五大核心内容是：（1）投资建设济南市地表水储存、抽水、输配水设施，目的在于增强供水系统可靠性，保护地下水；投资建设污水收集设施和泵站，以保护小清河水质，充分利用现有污水处理设施；（2）投资建设威海市集中供热系统，包括热电联产电厂和配套设施、配水系统以及旨在改善空气质量的支持性服务；（3）投资建设烟台市集中供热系统，包括调峰锅炉和热交换器厂及配套设施、配水系统以及旨在改善空气质量的支持性服务；（4）环境污染控制；（5）投资于支持并加强省级、市级和项目管理工作以及财务管理工作，支持开展并加强施工监理服务、行业和公用事业运营培训，支持更新小清河流域水质和管理数据库。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
